network.param.modules.person.customer

Interface ICustomerManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerManager

    public interface ICustomerManager
    Perform customer related operations.

    ICustomerManager add/invite/edit/get/getAll customer from the ParamNetwork. Using NetworkManager can able to access this reference.

    ICustomerManager customerManager = networkManager.getCustomerManager();

    Want to perform any bulk upload items to implement this interface IBulkImport interface for remote files, for local files use FileBulkFileImportConfig.

    ICatalogue defines below categories of operations:

    • addCustomer method for add customer object into ParamNetwork

    • inviteCustomer method for inviting customer into ParamNetwork

    • getAllCustomers method for get all customer IDs from ParamNetwork

    • addTemplate method for adding customer templates into ParamNetwork

    • getTemplate method for getting customer template from ParamNetwork

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jitendra Kumar Balla, ParamNetwork

    • Method Detail

      • inviteCustomer

        void inviteCustomer(IPersonTemplate customerTemplate,
                    ICustomer customer)
             throws TemplateNotFoundException,
                    InvalidConfigException,
                    NetworkException
        Method send invitation to customer.

        Method will send invitation to customer, it excepts ParamID or emailID. If paramID or Email is null it will throw InvalidConfigException and If template is not found it will throw IPersonTemplate exception, Otherwise it will send invitation to customer.

        Parameters:
        customerTemplate - customer template Object.
        customer - invitation will be send to customer emailID/ParamID
        Throws:
        TemplateNotFoundException - If given template not found it will throw TemplateNotFoundException
        InvalidConfigException - If EmailID/ParamID is missing it will throw InvalidConfigException
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

      • inviteCustomer

        void inviteCustomer(java.lang.String customerTemplateID,
                    ICustomer customer)
             throws TemplateNotFoundException,
                    InvalidConfigException,
                    NetworkException
        Method send invitation to customer.

        Method will send invitation to customer, it excepts ParamID or emailID. If paramID or Email is null it will throw InvalidConfigException and If template is not found it will throw IPersonTemplate exception, Otherwise it will send invitation to customer.

        Parameters:
        customerTemplateID - customer template ID.
        customer - invitation will be send to customer emailID/ParamID
        Throws:
        TemplateNotFoundException - If given template ID not found it will throw TemplateNotFoundException
        InvalidConfigException - If EmailID/ParamID is missing it will throw InvalidConfigException
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

      • addTemplate

        void addTemplate(IPersonTemplate personTemplatePage)
          throws NetworkException,
                 InvalidConfigException
        Method add new customer template into the param network.

        Method will creating new customer template. If any require fields are missing then it will throw InvalidConfigException exception, Otherwise it will add template into the network.

        Parameters:
        personTemplatePage - customer template ID.
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigException - If EmailID/ParamID is missing it will throw InvalidConfigException
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

                            throws NetworkException
        Method return given template type customer templates.
        Parameters:
        personTemplateType - Template filter type
        Returns:
        All customer template ID's
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

      • getTemplate

        IPersonTemplate getTemplate(java.lang.String id)
                     throws NetworkException,
                            AccessDeniedException,
                            TemplateNotFoundException
        Method return customer template for a given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - Template id
        Returns:
        All customer template ID's
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error
        TemplateNotFoundException - If given template ID not found it will throw TemplateNotFoundException

      • addCustomer

        void addCustomer(java.lang.String personTemplatePageID,
                 ICustomer customer)
          throws NetworkException,
                 AccessDeniedException,
                 TemplateNotFoundException
        Method add customer for a given template.

        addCustomer(String, ICustomer) add new customer if template is exists in the network and having enough access rights and all vendor data is filled, Otherwise it will throw an error.

        Parameters:
        personTemplatePageID - Template id
        customer - customer to be add.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error
        TemplateNotFoundException - If given template ID not found it will throw TemplateNotFoundException

      • getCustomer

        ICustomer getCustomer(java.lang.String id)
               throws NetworkException,
                      AccessDeniedException
        Method returns the customer for a given customer ID.

        getCustomer(String) get the customer if template customer exists and having enough access rights access customer information then it will return customer, Otherwise it will throw an error.

        Parameters:
        id - customer blockchain ID
        Returns:
        customer
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error

        Returns:
        All customer ID's
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.
